dsOverview.title: London's Global Vertical Stratospheric Ozone Profiles from OGO-4, 1967Sep-1969Jan

summary.p: This dataset contains vertical ozone profiles from the OGO-4 satellite at six stratospheric levels between 15mb and 0.25mb.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UCO/APS > Department of Astrophysical and Planetary Sciences, University of Colorado

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Chemistry/Oxygen Compounds > Ozone
